website_summaries.verdict: An extremely durable and effective ice cream scoop created by an aerospace engineer to make scooping ice cream easy. We think you'll find it a welcome addition to your kitchen utensil collection.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for its innovative design
Wide, contoured handle, pointed top, and stainless steel craftsmanship that makes it easy to push into firm ice cream
cons: Feels somewhat heavy, but it's still easy for most consumers to use
Pricey, but it's also very well-made

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesn’t work well once container is half full
customer_reviews.text: So, this ice cream scoop is beautiful and heavy and feels well made. The packaging is lovely, but in practice it just did not work for me. When the tub of ice cream is full, it works ok with the pushing motion instructed, but once you’re halfway down or more you cannot get the right angle and that ice cream will not budge! I held one side and tried to push and all it did was mangle the container, squishing the sides. The ice cream was starting to soften around the edges and yet I could still not scoop it with the pushing motion. I really wanted this one to work, but for me it’s beautiful but not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: This one is worth it, don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing. It works as stated and it is beautiful. I balked at the price until I thought about how many scoops I threw out as they broke, couldn't clean in crevices and grew mold. I broke both bones in my arm near the elbow and had a plate put in. At 70 muscle doesn't come back quickly. I thought I would have to eat half melted Ice Cream forever more but this goes through hard frozen like its butter.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully my relatives will like it as much as I do when I give ...
customer_reviews.text: It works on frozen yogurt. It is so powerful that I cut right through the cardboard box that the yogurt was in when I got to the bottom. Looking forward to trying it on really hard ice cream. Hopefully my relatives will like it as much as I do when I give them one each for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: BARDofM

customer_reviews.title: Reserved judgement, now confused by negative reviews...
customer_reviews.text: So this thing is relatively expensive and I read a number of negative reviews. After using this item, I can say that the negative comments have to be from challenged individuals that may not understand how to serve themselves food. The item works amazingly well and as many have indicated, allow for better leverage to scoop hard-pack ice cream by pushing rather than "scooping" as would be more traditional. This scooper works almost as advertised- I say almost because it is better than expected! If you have a modicum of dexterity, this is for you. If you don't, buy this for someone who will serve you and they'll thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Allen_B

customer_reviews.title: Buy it- trust me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I’ve seen complaints on this. Worth the price, 36$ is not that expensive for a utensil with a lifetime warranty and as well crafted. Definitely cut through frozen blue bell right out of the freezer, perfect scoops too. If you read the negative reviewers it’s the opposite, trust me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Scooper is a Beast
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive ice cream scooper and I can't believe I spent this much money on it. I'm really happy I did! It's pretty heave, which feels like a high quality product. How can you pass up the opportunity to use a scoop developed by an engineer?!? This thing powers through hard, frozen ice cream. Well worth the money. I'm sure it will outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Steen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: You might think it's expensive until you ask yourself just how many ice cream scoops you've replaced over the years and added up what you've spent. We previously had Kitchenaid scoops that always bubbled up on the scoop or the handles eventually gave out. I can already tell that this is the last scoop I will ever buy! Besides the durability, I'm amazed at how much easier it is to use! I'm someone who can barely throw a 7 lb. bowling ball, my wrists are super weak. The scoop design allows me to use my arm strength rather than my puny wrists! It's also pretty freakin' beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this scoop I was not impressed and I thought that I had bought a pig in a poke, but after I actually learned what the inventor/developer said about how to use it, I was really really pleased with the way that it actually works! This scoop is my go to scoop now for the hard frozen ice cream and yogurts that I like and although it is is pricey, it is not that much more than the others that I have bought that have promised so much and delivered so little! I love it and I think that if you choose to buy one and learn to use it you will agree.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Story

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST I’ve cream scooper on the market! I highly recommend it for ease of use. I have carpal tunnel and tendinitis, and this makes scooping ice cream a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY CENT! TEN stars!
customer_reviews.text: If you like COLD ice cream... THIS is the scoop! My husband loves cold, hard ice cream, but you CAN’T scoop it out with a regular ice cream scoop...until now. Seriously, this is the easiest, nicest scoop ever. AND it’s stainless steel, so it won’t oxidize in the dishwasher. If I could give bonus stars, I would. You actually use your arm, instead of your wrist, to scoop (which makes total sense, to use large muscles, instead of tiny wrist). Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Must have item in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream scooper EVER!! Yes, it does have some weight to it BUT because of it’s weight I can scoop even the hardest ice cream. My freezer is extra cold and my ice cream is always hard. I have bought several ice cream scoopers and they have all broke. After buying this one, I have not bought another and I no longer complain about scooping my ice cream. I would strongly recommend this product. Even if your ice cream is not frozen solid, the ease of use will help more then other regular ice cream scooper. If any one gets this, I do hope you enjoy it. I know I do.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best we have bought - quality product
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased many ice cream scoops over the past 10 years, sadly they have all deteriorated quickly. This one is stainless steel much heavier with a longer handle that fits comfortably in your hand, making cutting into ice cream effortless. We appreciate that this is dishwasher safe, clean up is easier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this scoop, it's indestructible, fits the hand perfect, can scoop the hardest ice cream with ease, easy to clean...It just doesn't get any better than this... It's a little pricey but I feel it would last a lifetime....and I was fed up with flimsy scoops bending and breaking, so I bit the bullet, and am happy I did....
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Harris

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my Grandfather who is often in charge of ice cream at our parties. I thought it would be nice to make the process a little bit simpler for him (I also kind of broke his regular scooper). This was the perfect replacement scooper. When I went to find the best of the best, I knew I found it. After having used it for a month or so, it is night and day between another traditional scooper. I would recommend reading the directions to understand the hand motion to use, otherwise it's super simple. Super stylish, durable, easy-to-use, and a great time saver. I would recommend it for any ice cream lover.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular gift for ice cream lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the scoop based on price and comment that it cuts through hard ice cream. When it arrived the first thing I noticed was the amazing packaging. Crazy for an ice cream scoop I thought. Inside it even had directions and a help line- not kidding. So, even though it’s 10 am, I have to try it. Works as advertised and IS easy and does not hurt my “weak wrist”! The way it is packaged and the fact it works so well makes this a spectacular gift for your ice cream lover!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop ever!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop is heavy! And extremely easy to scoop ice cream with! And works great for scooping refrigerated mashed potatoes! I bought this as a gift for someone with weak wrists and arthritis but after trying it out I had to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: paladin

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scooper is an engineering marvel. We love it and everyone that sees it wants one. Best ice cream scooper period. It could also be used for a close quarters weapon. There is some serious weight to this thing. Cuts right through the hardest of ice creams.
customer_reviews.author: J2theDD

customer_reviews.title: BEST ice cream scoop EVER!
customer_reviews.text: BEST ice cream scoop EVER! I was skeptical about spending so much money on an ice cream scoop but after buying multiple scoops from cheap to expensive and all of them failing in one way or another I decided to go for it. My favorite thing about the Midnight Scoop is how easy it glides through even the toughest frozen treat followed closely by it being dishwasher safe. Easy for my 7 year old and family with arthritis to use. The only con is the price but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: Hefty and ergonomic. I had some bruising on my palm due to scooping Edie's ice cream. This cuts through the ice cream like butter...not sure why it works so well, but it does. Also, no bruising to palm. I was thinking of purchasing a second as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Works like any other ice cream scooper. Does not work could in small containers. Heavy. Looks cool but that’s about it. Over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Shields

customer_reviews.title: Genius design... looks great, feels great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! No more soaking a scooper in hot water... no more putting the ice cream container into the microwave for a few seconds to soften it... just open the container and scoop out the hard ice cream with ease. Made to last. The packaging is top notch too, so it makes a really nice gift. My family gave several Midnight Scoops away as gifts to other families for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mon M.

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a person who has everything!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a man who has everything and is a huge ice cream fan ( to the degree he opened a gourmet ice cream shop). He is very happy with this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: micklovesgolf

customer_reviews.title: Pointy End Slices Thru Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: When the Ice Cream is really hard even with this scoop it is difficult to get a scoop. Nevertheless I prefer this scoop over the others that I have had. The stainless steel is smooth and easy on the hand, the shape allows me to put maximum pressure on the ice cream and I just drop it into the dish washer to clean it. I also found a better place to store ice cream in the freezer part of the refrigerator. It is still hard but just not quite as hard as the former location...
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: BEST ice cream scoop ever. 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice cream 🍨 scoop for my husband because he’s so picky about ice cream scoops. He was amazed and very happy 😃 that there could be an ice cream scoop so awesome. It was a lot more expensive than the other scoops, but it should last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Christmas Angel 😇 2003

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for frozen ice cream. I have trouble with my hands due to a medical condition and this scooper made it possible for me to get frozen ice cream out of ge container! Would recommend to everyone! Quality is superb and will last a lifetime. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and awkward
customer_reviews.text: It’s too heavy. It is hard to use even after watching the video. Doesn’t get an actual scoop but just thin pieces. Can’t dig in deeply. I don’t like it but it’s attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Fireball

customer_reviews.title: be careful not to dig in too deep because it easily cuts into the ice cream and you'll end up ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works. It's heavy and well-made. If you have a wrist problem, be careful not to dig in too deep because it easily cuts into the ice cream and you'll end up with a big chunk that's hard scoop out. It also comes in a really nice box, so it would make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if you are someone who just really appreciates a well thought out, high quality product that performs above the rest, this is the ice cream scooper for you. After purchasing one, I went out bought 6 more for my family and friends. Yes, it's that good! I love supporting local as well and only the best products come out of my beautiful home state of Michigan. Don't over think this. Order it, and enjoy! You will not regret it. I promise!
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scooper
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feels like a heavy duty, great quality scooper! Works with super solid ice cream without running it under hot water. It took some practice, but I can get nice spheres of ice cream with it. I love it. It comes in such a beautiful box that I'm actually thinking it would be a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Best quality ice cream scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as part of my son's moving away care package after college graduation. Our whole family is ice cream fanatics so I bought him the best quality ice cream scooper EVER. We laughed in amazement at how beautifully it's packaged like a piece of fine jewelry. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty ice cream scoop.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a "good" ice cream scoop for a long time. This may sound expensive, but it is a" forever" ice cream scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful and easy to use ice cream scoop that I have ever used. It makes you want to keep ice cream on hand just so you can use it. Stop ruining your wrists with lesser ice cream scoopers. Scooping is much easier with this luxurious scoop. Another great plus is that the Midnight Scoop is seamless which makes it super easy to clean as there are no crannies for residue to hide.
customer_reviews.author: mudobber

customer_reviews.title: Good scooper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ice cream scooper, but it works best on 1/2 gallon rectangle shaped ice cream containers. I only buy ice cream by the pint, in order to get everyones favorite flavor. You cannot push this scoop through a round container so you have to pull the scoop through, just like the video says not to do. The quality is superb but I'm not sure I would recommend it to anyone who buys smaller containers of ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: NoFigram

customer_reviews.title: ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: We love this scoop. I used it to Scoop Haagen Das vanilla and that's a hard ice cream and it was easy with this scoop. It is comfortable in your hand, dishwasher safe, pretty to look at, we have the stainless. Just pushes right through the ice cream like a plow pushing snow. A good investment and it will last forever. Thank you for resigning this Scoop, you're a genius.
customer_reviews.author: S. Judith Morris

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Sure this ice cream scooper is expensive but its crazy worth it! Ice cream no longer needs to warm up before scooping! This thing goes through ice cream so smoothly and easily! The Scoop itself is heavy and clearly is designed to last! Cleaning couldn't be easier as it just goes in the dish washer with no issues of damage. I'm amazed on how easily this worked and saves the struggle of scooping ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes the effort of scooping out ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: This scoop really does the job without much force from your wrist. I was pleasantly surprised. The weight is very well balanced and sturdy so that it does the digging into the ice cream. Feels durable and should last a long time. This came gift ready! Very impressive gift box and bow. Wonderful tool for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps deminish one of those little irritants in life
customer_reviews.text: love, love, love - a solid weighted devise that does help with dishing up firm home-made ice cream. Feels good in your hand and the way it is shaped allows for more force to be applied when needed
customer_reviews.author: JanJan

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Solid, Hefty, Feels good in hand. Better in the wider tubs like Breyers or Blue Bell. I like Tillamook, which comes in a cylindrical tub, like Edy's, so it's a little harder to maneuver in there, but the scoop still has a great feel to it. Amazing packaging, too. I felt like I was opening a diamond tennis bracelet box.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Grebe

customer_reviews.title: A baby rattle.
customer_reviews.text: This is not solid. Mine was rattling after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo E.

customer_reviews.title: Best ice cream scoop ever!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scoop comes in the nicest box, you'd think it was jewelry. It does have in it a mighty fine ice cream scoop. It does work well for scooping hard ice cream, and it's my go to scoop now. My last go to scoop was 30 years old, until it broke in hard ice cream. I cried a few tears. Now I'm happy. My dad is an ice cream snob, and I'll be getting him one of these.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: It was so nicely packed and made me think it will be great for gifts. Got the ice cream from the freeze and it was very hard but the scoop slid thru it so easy. I have bad hands and wrist and it didn't hurt them. Love the shinny scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Jere Andrus Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So expensive but will out live you
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it is insanely expensive for what it is but you will never need to buy another ice cream scoop. I bought it because I was sick of the ones that are plastic and metal falling apart eventually or having the chrome coating coming off in my ice cream. This is a solid hunk of metal that will last for ever. Really your grand kids will get to inherit this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Karl

customer_reviews.title: the scoop you've been waiting for.
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the hype. Comfortable, and very effective at scooping the ice cream straight from the chest freezer ( and you know how hard that is). Nice aesthetic design - deserves a place in the metropolitan museum of art.
customer_reviews.author: Sww777

customer_reviews.title: You'll Have This Forever
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's pricey for an ice cream scoop, but you'll never have to replace it, so well worth the money. I have carpal tunnel in both hands and had surgery on both wrists, so an ergonomic scoop like this one is great. It's made so you scoop with your arm/shoulder and not by turning your wrist. If you are prone to carpal issues, this is the scoop for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine M.

customer_reviews.title: best ice cream scoop I've used and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This scoop really does scoop ice cream better than any other scoop, and you don't have push hard with your wrist to do the job. Pro's: works well, DISHWASHER SAFE. Con's: it's a bit big and heavy (if I were an 80 year old small boned person with arthritis, I would not be able to hold it well), and a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Fit and Solidly Built!
customer_reviews.text: You have to have a solid one-piece ice cream scoop. With this scoop, I have no worries that the handle will break or any of the metal will bend. It does scoop easily but I have yet to experience really hard ice cream. The one negative is that the ice cream does not fall from the scoop and sometimes you have to use a spoon to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Serious scooper
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no joke. It will scoop ice cream like nobodies business. Getting this thing to scooo a helping of ice cream just for myself feels like complete overkill. I imagine the scoop feeling most dissatisfied with me meager utilization of it's abilities. Like we should probably see other house guests.
customer_reviews.author: nimbice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great ice cream scoop. Essentially unbreakable, heavy. Easy to scoop what would be otherwise impossible for a kitchen spoon or cheap ice cream scoop (which is every ice cream scoop).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The best ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: Great ice cream scoop. My husband especially likes it. Easy for him to scoop ice cream with this. Gets through even the hardest Ice cream. It's nice and heavy and looks fancy and expensive. I put it in the dish washer everyday and it is shiny and looks brand new. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: TombRaider

customer_reviews.title: Scooperfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent presentation. The scooper, is of the highest quality level. The best part is it works just as promised. It takes the strain and pressure off the wrist and works the larger muscles in your arm. Will buy for family members. It’s a definite must have for ice cream lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Breeze

customer_reviews.title: The best thought out product by far
customer_reviews.text: Well lets get this clear the guy that envented this really did put his heart into this the easest way to scoop ice cream by far with ease i joked about paying the price when i got it because i feel like i paid $30.00 for the packaging and the rest on the scoop this was made with the people with bad grip and weak wrist in mind thank you for that..
customer_reviews.author: michael pacetti

customer_reviews.title: Its a solid tool!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this ice cream scoop because my last one broke. Which my last one was probably a $10 dollar scoop that I purchased from Wall Mart. This scoop how ever i don't bevlieve I will will ever have to replace! Its very solid, very easy to use, and cleans easy. I love it. I would recommend it to anyone who is wanting something they will never have to replace, plus it actually just looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  And I can put it in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop has exceeded expectations. I needed something to replace a brand name scoop that had issues. This scoop doesn’t pit when I put it in the dishwasher. Also, since it doesn’t have seams, no liquids are retained inside of it (other one always leaked nasty water). Ergonomically, it’s easy to handle - even in the most frozen ice cream. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Insolent Napkins

customer_reviews.title: The Porsche of Ice Cream Scoops
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive indulgence, but it works exactly as its engineer-designer described in his video. It is especially appropriate if you have arthritis of the hands or wrists. It's solid, heavy, ergonomic and easy to clean. A useful indulgence.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Mordes

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scoop I’ve ever seen, much less owned. Easy to clean, easy to scoop, has lasted forever. Doesn’t corrode or have loose parts after time like all the other scoops I’ve tried. It’s a little pricey, but you will never need another scoop again. One of my best finds. Do yourself a favor and get it. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bigironmech

customer_reviews.title: The BEST ice cream scoop ever!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop will last a lifetime. I wish i had found this a long time ago. I've been through many ice scream scoops because of being broken or ruined by the dishwasher. This scoop is Awesome. It will make a perfect high quality gift to others also. I absolutely love it. I have arthritis in my hands and now i can actually scoop my own ice cream. Thanks for making this.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Young

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is the perfect gift for my husband, but the whole family will use it. I tested it on homemade Sicilian Gelato that had been frozen hard over-night. It works like a dream! If you are making homemade ice cream and gelato, I recommend these to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I originally got it from the Kickstarter campaign. I received such a great product that decided to purchase another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a hot chainsaw through butter!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scoop might be a bit pricey, but it is worth EVERY PENNY AND DOLLAR! I'm a young guy, and I've bent my share of soup spoons trying to get a taste of the creamy bliss...This is my new weapon of choice to dig into a bucket of frozen euphoria!
customer_reviews.author: Zenularity

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the boss!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the boss! What a great idea. Real stainless steel and solid. Liked it so much I bought one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Wilkening

customer_reviews.title: ITS BEAUTIFUL AND WORTHY OF DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: OMG, DO NOT BUY ANY OTHER SCOOP BUT THIS ONE !!! ITS BEAUTIFUL AND WORTHY OF DISPLAY ..ITS FUNTION IS THE VERY BEST. DO NOT LOOK ANYWHERE ELSE, ITS THE PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY DESIGNER IN YOUR LIFE, PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous - buy it now
customer_reviews.text: This scoop is worth every penny. Nice weight to it and fits great in the hand but the best part is IT SCOOPS OUT ICE CREAM AND SHERBET SO EASILY. It comes beautifully packaged and it is the best scoop I have ever used. Don't be put off by cost - worth every penny and a great gift for the ice cream lover.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Repetitive Buyer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second scoop. (I was an initial crowdfunding backer.) Best design ever. Had some problems with my first one due to being non-dishwasher-safe. Now I bought the ultimate one. Stainless steel. Looking forward to using it after Christmas (it's a present!!) Even accepted additional tariffs to get it. (amazon handled that great)
customer_reviews.author: GoedekeMichel

customer_reviews.title: Literally a beautiful ice cream scoop, I'll never buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Just picking it up, you can feel the quality. The packaging is just as nice. This is one of those things I will pass down to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scoop is well worth the money. It scoops out hard ice cream with ease. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LBIbeachlover

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice cream scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best Ice cream scoop there is. I couldn't tell anyone it's worth the money unless you actually work in an ice cream shop, but if you do, do yourself and your wrist a favor and invest in one of these. It will make your job of scooping ice cream easier, more comfortable, and even more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ice Cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate good tools. I don't think you could find a better ice cream scoop than this. It is stainless steel and worth the money. I like hard ice cream like Haagen daz. This scoop works on very cold (0°F ) dense ice cream. You get what you pay for with this product. You will never need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Glynn

customer_reviews.title: I used it on my Haagen Dazs chocolate icecream right out of freezer and it cuts through it like butter! I could not believe this was even ...
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scoop is a piece of ART! Very elegant, yet works wonders when used to scoop up ice cream. I used it on my Haagen Dazs chocolate icecream right out of freezer and it cuts through it like butter! I could not believe this was even possible till I tried it myself. Very high quality product. I can tell the designer has truly put a lot of thought into it. Great job! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Z.

customer_reviews.title: An Icecream Scoop that is Everything Promised!
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and the way the ice cream scoop just automatically sits in my hand. It works beautifully on really hard ice cream and is easy for me to use with my arthritic hands. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: cbart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ice cream scooper by far. I have small cubby hands and have no problem maneuvering this in somewhat hard ice cream. If it's a hard ice cream just warm it under warm water and glides right through it like butter.
customer_reviews.author: BayBay-x-2

customer_reviews.title: Last scoop I’ll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scoop! I’ll probably never need another scoop in my lifetime. The handle is nice and thick and easy to hold. It’s a very heavy piece and helps to get down into the ice cream. Only drawback I can maybe see for some is that the end of the handle is so thick that it may not fit into some dishwasher utensil holders. It just barely fits in mine so I can wash it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty scoop. Kind of pricey but it works well. It’s nice to put in the dishwasher. You could fracture a skull with it, super durable. I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ice Cream Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit uneasy about spending as much as I did on this scoop. However, I am so glad I did because this is the nicest ice cream scoop I have ever seen and used. It’s actually beautiful which is odd to say about a kitchen utensil. The box it arrived in was really nice and offered tremendous protection so the scoop could not arrive damaged. The scoop works so well, even with extremely hard ice cream. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is the best
customer_reviews.text: By far the best ice cream scooper on the planet. It is a bit expensive, but will be the only one you need for your lifetime. I plan on passing it down to my future children. It is bigger then you think an ice cream scooper would be. Has a nice heavy solid feel to it. Dishwasher safe. No issues after more uses than I care to admit. You should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Korey S.

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate Ice Cream Scoop
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been looking for the perfect ice cream scoop - and IMHO if this ain't it, it's darn close. I got the stainless steel version and have used it almost daily for months now and it looks as good as when it came out of the box. Very easy on the hands and you can get a lot of leverage with it to dig deep. I have gone thru many cheaper scoops where the plating actually scratched or flaked off after awhile. This scoop was a pleasant surprise. Is it expensive? - Yeah. But I would say that the quality is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn G. Dobias

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew something so simple could be so good!
customer_reviews.text: It not only works but works well! I needed to replace my existing scoop and saw this on Amazon. It appeared unique in design and seemed better thought out than generations of duplicate scoops by various vendors. It actually works as advertised and demonstrated in the video. The Handle is large and heavy which helps greatly in pushing through each scoop. Well made and well done.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use ice cream scoop.
customer_reviews.text: This was given to my son and his wife for their 9th Anniversary. They loved it and was used that night for ice cream they had after their Anniversary dinner. They really like the scoop!
customer_reviews.author: claud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!  No more struggling to get your ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hold & use. This is heavier than any other scoop we’ve had but that’s why it works so well. It’s very substantial and will be the last scoop you’ll ever need. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: BEST ICE SCOOP EVER
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. this thing is awesome and easy to use. my wife always has a hard time scooping ice cream and 9 out of 10 tens pops the ice cream in microwave to warm a little. not with this thing she's able to scoop ice cream right out.
customer_reviews.author: thomas urban

customer_reviews.title: Effortless scooping is just hype and marketing, but this damn thing is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of scooping ice cream and is a pleasure to hold and use. And if you ever had to knock out an intruder, this thing feels deadly in the hand. You still have to use a little elbow grease on deep freeze ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Baker

customer_reviews.title: Buy Once Cry Once
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about the price, but this scoop works exactly as advertised. Save your wrists and elbows and buy one now. This may be the last ice cream scoop you ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: so simple - Highly Recomend!
customer_reviews.text: why reinvent the wheel? well this scoop does that. is it awkward at first... yes, but once you use it you question why it hasn't been designed before? it is a great scoop, fantastic material and great weight. highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ceejay

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a third generation ice cream lover. My grand parents used to have a dozen or so different flavors in 3 gallon buckets. I have tried at least a dozen ice cream scoops and this is by far the best I have ever used! Beautiful design, perfectly weighted, cuts through ice cream like butter. Highly recommended. We be buying as a wedding gift for all my children.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Whitchurch

customer_reviews.title: Best Scoop Ever
customer_reviews.text: After 50 years of buying ice cream scoops finally a scoop that works. Best ever. Worth every dollar. Would recommend to anyone who needs to scoop ice cream. What's your wrist worth?
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best available!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and finally I don’t hurt my hand anymore !! It is very well built, great quality. I would buy again immediately. Go for it. The best available.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas CC

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop I have used.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works very well. Solid metal, no flex and the broad handle makes it easy to dig into the ice cream. Easy to clean, just a quick rinse most the time. It is a bit more expensive than many scoops but well worth, in this case you definitely get what you pay for. We make our own ice cream regularly, so this is a great match. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly even when ice cream is frozen to 0 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Scoop arrived in mail, I immediately wanted to test it to see if it lived up to the name. It does! I can now easily scoop frozen solid ice cream. Before this scoop I would give up and only have a little ice cream. Now I will need to buy ice cream more often.
customer_reviews.author: Team Indy

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Not as impressive as I thought it might be. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream Enabler
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am a believer! Cuts through solid ice cream better than others I’ve used. Still can require a bit of effort on really hard ice cream but you’ll appreciate the difference it does make.
customer_reviews.author: BriK

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ice cream scoop. It is better than any that I have ever used. As hard as my ice cream gets in my freezer, I am able to scoop it out and not hurt my hand or my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B. Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made, last forever
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the stars printed on the handle but this scoop is very solid and we'll made! I don't think I'll ever have to buy another ice cream scoop and will probably be able to pass this onto my kids one day.
customer_reviews.author: SNichols

customer_reviews.title: It really gets the ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I like the hefty handle. The scoop part really gets in the hard ice cream. The handle gives it the weight to help scoop out the ice cream. I have arthritis and the hefty handle really helps me.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Came in a nice box which I appreciated because I bought it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice box which I appreciated because I bought it as a bridal shower gift. I packed ice cream toppings and it was a hit. Very good quality and the design is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Small Town Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy feels good easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Pointed for ease of grabbing ice cream. Worth every penny after the 18 yo boy broke two because he wants the ice cream below all the other ice cream. He seriously tries to go to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like this scoop a lot. A bit pricey but I don’t want to buy another one for a long time. I think this one will last forever. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Royer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Ice Cream Scoop - bar none!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream scoop is just an amazing piece of art and engineering! -- Perfectly balanced and just exactly what an ice cream scoop should be. Way to go inventor!!!!!! You need to make more products this good!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and strong ice cream scoop
customer_reviews.text: What a beast this thing is! I eat ice cream almost every day and this tool is a must have. Its built incredibly well and fits your hand like a glove. A must have item in every ice cream lovers kitchen! Happy scooping!
customer_reviews.author: aces2splash

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream scoop ever. I keep my freezer at -1F, therefore, my ice cream is usually very hard. I love that you can push and plow through the ice cream with no problem. I love that it's all one seamless piece so that it is easy to clean. It's strong enough, I don't think throwing it off a skyscraper or running it over with an tank would break it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted.....piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of the best purchases I have ever made! We love ice cream and this is the best ice cream scoop EVER designed. It comes packaged in a beautiful box perfect for gift giving. The box is so beautiful it wouldn't even need gift wrap. When opened, your scoop is cradled in beautiful black velvet, so gorgeous ❤ It's so worth every penny! Looking forward to giving one as a gift 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Sampson

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was very leary of spending over $35 on an ice cream scoop.....the only time I spend that kind of money on utensils is if it is pampered chef or cutco knives, but I am 100% satisfied! Love the scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Petitclerc

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Ice Cream Scoop by Midnight Scoop - Ergonomic Ice Cream Scooper for Hard Ice Cream - Dishwasher Safe Ice Cream Spade
feature_bullets: YOU HAVE BEEN SCOOPING ICE CREAM WRONG. Instead of prying at hard ice cream with weak wrists, the Midnight Scoop allows you to ergonomically PUSH into the ice cream using your arms and shoulders for more leverage and power. IT MAKES A HUGE DIFFERENCE.

DIG THROUGH HARD ICE CREAM WITH EASE. The CURVED HANDLE is ergonomically designed to dig through the ice cream, protecting weak wrists, even those with carpal tunnel. The spear-shaped front tip cuts through ROCK HARD ice cream straight from the freezer.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Our old scoop design was not dishwasher safe. Now, our new updated design is stainless steel and DISHWASHER SAFE.

FEATURED AS ONE OF OPRAH'S FAVORITE THINGS. If Oprah loves it, you will too. Perfect for any occasion, the Midnight Scoop is a heavy duty, HEIRLOOM quality product for friends and family. A great gift for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, and holidays.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We offer a LIFETIME GUARANTEE. If you drop your scoop from a 45 floor building or run it over with your car, we will replace your scoop - no questions asked. Even IF it breaks. Ultra-safe and durable, contains no plastic or rubber.
